We held a company lunch for our office staff at A1 Party and Tent Rentals.

We placed an order for pickup, and a driver went to collect it. The owner, I believe, answered the phone, and their customer service was excellent. They even included extra sauces, which everyone loved. We will definitely be coming back, and our office has shared many praises about the experience.

Takeout packaging for the single serving cholent could be better. But the cholent is so good it makes up for it!

This is a really cool spot. Nestled in Back Lawrence, this food bar has a really relaxed vibe. We ate outside at a table overlooking the golf course! The menu has a bunch of good choices but not overwhelming. The food is pretty good. I noticed a lot of sweeter sauces on the meats as well as maple syrup in a couple of the dishes. If you like a little sweetness to your chicken and meat this is a really good spot.

Kids LOVED their meals - the portions are generous and delicious - and the toys are a nice touch!
Chicken sandwich and chicken poppers were simply incredible.
The no name salad was great but could use a different dressing.
A great spot!!!
Food is so good! The Judd's collaboration was so awesome. Looking forward to more meals from MG! Thank you so much for a great dining experience.

An amazing addition to five towns - beautiful, fast casual place with an awesome menu. Poppers, chicken sandwich, burger - all 5 stars. So delicious! Great service and friendly staff. Highly recommend trying!
Great vibe!  Excellent food, reasonable prices. The owner is always there and making sure everyone is happy.
